---------------Sign In/ Sign Up---------------------------- Please wait... Wrong Password !!! Sign in successfully ! User not exist !!! Field can\'t be empty Password max characters is 11! Phone already register Phone Number must include 10 digits Must pick or enter date Phone Number must start with \'05\' Phone Number must include only 10 digits Date format is \'\dd/mm/yyyy\'\ You have successfully registered to SporTeam! We hope you get the best out of our app, Wishing you lots of fun sports moments with special people. Let\'s Start Now! Maybe Later Password can\'t includ white spaces The App is Only for 16+

/-----------Permission------------------------------------- Ok Cancel Permission Request SporTeam need Permission to access\n device location to provide required services.\n Please allow permission Grant Permission Permission Denied Permission to access device location is permanently denied. you need to go to setting to allow the permission

/-------Create Game----------------------------------------- Create! Type Of Game: Location "Date Of Game" Create New Game Location can\'t be empty! You must put date that isn\'t past! You must put current year!
